class_notes: JM Students only.  Per ABA rules, JD and LLM students will not receive credit for JM courses
course_description: The IP Applications course covers various types of intellectual property including copyright, patent, trademark, and trade secret. After completing this course, student will be able to apply the appropriate IP type to a particular situation and understand agreements typically tied to IP.
